fields.name: nft
fields.label: Data NFT
fields.help: All metadata is stored on-chain in a newly deployed ERC-721 contract representing this asset.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible. You can use [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/basics). You can change the description at any time. If you provide personal data, please note that it will remain in the transaction history. For more information on how personal data is handled within the metadata, please refer to our [privacy policy](/privacy/en).

fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.help: Give proper attribution for your data set. You are welcome to use a pseudonym, and you can change your author name at any time. Please note that it will remain in the transaction history. For more information on how personal data is handled within the metadata, please refer to our [privacy policy](/privacy/en).

fields.name: dockerImage
fields.label: Docker Image
fields.help: Please select an image to run your algorithm.

fields.name: dockerImageCustom
fields.label: Docker Image URL
fields.help: Provide the name of a public Docker image or the full url if you have it hosted in a 3rd party repo

fields.name: dockerImageCustomTag
fields.label: Docker Image Tag
fields.help: Provide the tag for your Docker image.

fields.name: dockerImageCustomEntrypoint
fields.label: Docker Entrypoint
fields.help: Provide the entrypoint for your algorithm.

fields.name: termsAndConditions
fields.label: Terms & Conditions
options: I agree to these Terms and Conditions

fields.name: dataTokenOptions
fields.label: Datatoken Name & Symbol
fields.help: The datatoken for this data set will be created with this name & symbol.

fields.name: providerUrl
fields.label: Custom Provider URL
fields.help: Enter the URL for your custom provider or leave blank to use the default provider. [Learn more](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/provider/).

fields.name: files
fields.label: File
fields.help: Please enter the URL to your data set file and click "ADD FILE" to validate the data. This URL will be stored encrypted after publishing. For a compute data set, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

fields.name: links
fields.label: Sample file
fields.help: Please enter the URL to a sample of your data set file and click "ADD FILE" to validate the data. This file should reveal the data structure of your data set, e.g. by including the header and one line of a CSV file. This file URL will be publicly available after publishing.

fields.name: algorithmPrivacy
fields.label: Algorithm Privacy
fields.help: By default, your algorithm can be downloaded for a fixed or dynamic price in addition to running in compute jobs. Enabling this option will prevent downloading, so your algorithm can only be run as part of a compute job on a data set.

fields.name: access
fields.label: Access Type
fields.help: Choose how you want your files to be accessible for the specified price.
fields.disclaimer: Please do not provide downloadable personal data without the consent of the data subjects.

fields.name: timeout
fields.label: Timeout
fields.help: Define how long buyers should be able to download the data set again after the initial purchase.
